title: Error in opening applications since Android 10 update
content:
Have recently updated my Pixel with Android 10 and since then, most of the applications are not working. Phone sometime gets hang.
Major issue, no feed opens from google chrome and throws an error message "IP server cannot be found" & DNS_PROB_FINISHED_BAD_CONFIG

Is this some setting issue? Could you help me please.

Thanks,
Sakshi
